mapper.insert: insert into tbl_member (member_id, member_pw, member_name) values (#{member_id}, #{member_pw}, #{member_name})
mapper.update: update tbl_member set member_pw = #{member_pw}, member_name = #{member_name}, modidate = now() where member_id = #{member_id}
mapper.select: select member_id from tbl_member where member_id = #{member_id} and member_pw = #{member_pw}
select member_id from tbl_member where member_id = #{member_id}
